appetizers.name: Gobi Bezule
appetizers.description: Battered cauliflower pieces finished in a mild coconut flavor sauce.

appetizers.name: Konkani Shrimp
appetizers.description: Pieces of shrimp cooked in a coconut flavored sauce with a touch of garlic, onion mustard seeds and curry leaves, served with paratha bread.

entrees.name: Gobi Musallam
entrees.description: Cauliflower, light spices, yogurt, onions and bell peppers.

entrees.name: Methi Mango Chicken
entrees.description: Chicken breast cubes, cooked with fenugreek and mango in a curry sauce.

entrees.name: Lamb Daalwala
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with yellow lentils.

entrees.name: Khatta Meetha Shrimp
entrees.description: Shrimps cooked in a sweet and tangy sauce with onions, green peppers and carrots.

entrees.name: Tandoori Salmon Tikka
entrees.description: Fresh Chilean salmon fillets lightly marinated and cooked to perfection in the tandoor oven.
